## provideChatHeadless() function

Provide an instance of [ChatHeadless](./anguyen-chat-headless-test.chatheadless.md) with all functionality built in.

**Signature:**

export declare function provideChatHeadless(config: HeadlessConfig, clients?: {
    bot?: ChatClient;
    agent?: ChatClient;
}): ChatHeadless;
